sentences.english: Chinese New Year Eve chanting, praying for longevity, Lion dance, tea party.
sentences.chinese: 农历年除夕延生法会，舞狮，茶叙。

sentences.english: At last, the brief introduction for the mainly genres and styles of lion-dance sports is given.
sentences.chinese: 最后简述了舞狮运动的主要流派和风格。

sentences.english: Lion dancing can be broadly categorized into 2 styles, northern lion dancing and southern dancing.
sentences.chinese: 中国的舞狮可划分为北狮和南狮两个派别。

sentences.english: By 14, he was fully enrolled in the athletic club's lion dance troupe.
sentences.chinese: 14岁的时候，他正式加入了这个体育会的舞狮队。

sentences.english: Keyboard and others pretend to be lion came to congratulate.
sentences.chinese: 李剑等人假扮成舞狮队前来祝贺。

sentences.english: Under such a person with lion blade intermingled with the scene, intended to every struck Nemesis.
sentences.chinese: 刀锋等人以舞狮为名混入现场，意欲一举击杀仇人。

sentences.english: Lion dance and dragon dance are traditional performances of the Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 舞狮舞龙是春节的传统表演。

definition: festival entertainment (lion dance, dragon lantern etc)
Yangge, a popular rural folk dance
stilts/walking on stilts as component of folk dance
waist drum/waist-drum dance (Han ethnic group folk dance)
folk festival, esp. involving shrine or image of God
colored lantern (used at Lantern Festival 元宵節|元宵节)
